name: LOCUST (Gaming Done Wright)
description:
A short horror game, inspired by the uprising "analog horror" category.

A short horror game based off of the "analog horror" concept.

After you (Alan) receives  a call from an old high school friend, you're tasked with checking on his paranoid sister and senile mother at their house. It becomes quickly apparent that things are not what they seem as a televised alert broadcast warns you not to go outside or even look out the windows. Save the sister and more importantly save your self, in LOCUST.

The surface belongs to the swarm.

Please feel free to donate to our patreon at

www.patreon.com/thewrightplacetobe
